alert.note: Alert for George; Greene (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:02PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern George and southwestern Greene Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Lucedale, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern George and southwestern Greene Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
